snippet.title: Doomtrooper CCG - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Secret Cow Level and Heroic Signatures present DOOMTROOPER. The classic 1990's Collectible Card Game (CCG) returns in an all new digital format.

Design by original designer Bryan Winter and Secret Cow level, Doomtrooper takes place in a distant future where the Earth has long since been depleted of natural resources and abandoned. Humanity has spread to the worlds of Venus, Mars, Mercury, Luna (the first settlement following the exodus from Earth), and the Asteroid Belt. Corporate Warfare and the onslaught of the demonic Dark Legion leads to non-stop battles in this reimagined card game.

Join the Secret Cow Level Discord to join the beta (invites rolling out regularly): https://discord.gg/SecretCowLevel

Sign up for the mailing list for more info (and access to the beta): https://doomtroopergame.com

For more info, follow @doomtroopergame on all the social media:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/doomtroopergame
Facebook: https://facebook.com/doomtroopergame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/doomtroopergame
